abstract.t: This document defines a new SRv6 function which can be used for SRv6 based inter-layer network programming. It is a variant of the SRv6 End.X behavior which is called "End.XU". Instead of pointing to an interface with layer-3 adjacency, the End.XU behavior points to an underlay interface which connects to a remote layer-3 node via underlying links or connections that may be invisible in the L3 topology.
